bibl.title: Callimachus' Muses. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Examines the relationship Callimachus has with the Muses by investigating their role and function in a number of different texts, especially the Aetia.
bibl.seg: Morrison Andrew, Callimachus' Muses. Avec résumé en anglais.
Benjamin Acosta-Hughes, Luigi Lehnus and Susan Stephens (Edd.), Brill's Companion to Callimachus (Leiden - Boston, 2011) pp. 329-348.
Examines the relationship Callimachus has with the Muses by investigating their role and function in a number of different texts, especially the Aetia.
